com.irurueta.ar.calibration.estimators.DualAbsoluteQuadricEstimator

Packages that use DualAbsoluteQuadricEstimator
Package
Description
com.irurueta.ar.calibration.estimators
This package contains classes needed to estimate structures needed for camera calibration

  • Uses of DualAbsoluteQuadricEstimator in com.irurueta.ar.calibration.estimators

    Subclasses of DualAbsoluteQuadricEstimator in com.irurueta.ar.calibration.estimators
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LMSEDualAbsoluteQuadricEstimator
    Implementation of a Dual Absolute Quadric estimator using an LMSE (Least Mean Squared Error) solution for provided pinhole cameras.
    class 
    WeightedDualAbsoluteQuadricEstimator
    Implementation of a Dual Absolute Quadric estimator using a weighted solution for provided pinhole cameras.
